sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to union.
message_1: Let A = {1,2} and B = {3,4}. Find (A x B) ∪ (B x A) and (B x A) ∪ (A x B) and prove that the two sets are not equal, thus showing that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to union.
